DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety effectiveness newly initiate dabigatran among patient diagnose non valvular atrial fibrillation ( NVAF ) comparison newly initiate rivaroxaban user newly initiate apixaban user
DOC.brief_title: The Comparative Safety Effectiveness Dabigatran , Versus Rivaroxaban , Apixaban Utilized Department Defense Non-Valvular Atrial Fibrillation Patient Population : A Retrospective Database Analysis
DOC.criteria: Age 18+ index date Patients must prescribe either dabigatran , rivaroxaban , apixaban identify pharmacy claim study period .
